sql-case.value: SELECT 1 as a
SELECT id from t_order where name !~ '^pg_toast'
SELECT (count(*)+1) as a
SELECT schema(), database()
select "id" from "t_order" where "t_order"."id"=10
SELECT current_timestamp
SELECT t_order.* FROM t_order t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT t_order.order_id,t_order.user_id,status FROM t_order t_order WHERE t_order.user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order_item WHERE item_id <> ? ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM t_order_item WHERE item_id != ? ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM t_order_item WHERE item_id IS NOT NULL AND item_id NOT IN (?, ?) ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM t_order_item WHERE item_id IS NOT NULL AND item_id NOT BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
select * from t_order where user_id = ? and order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id IN (?, ?, ?) AND order_id IN (?, ?) ORDER BY user_id, order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id BETWEEN ? AND ? AND order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY user_id, order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id >= ? AND user_id <= ? AND order_id >= ? AND order_id <= ? ORDER BY user_id, order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id IN (?, ?) AND order_id IN (?, ?) ORDER BY order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE is_deleted = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_order WHERE (user_id = ? AND status LIKE ?)
SELECT count(0) AS orders_count FROM t_order o WHERE o.status LIKE CONCAT('%%', ?, '%%') AND o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT count(0) AS orders_count FROM t_order o WHERE o.status LIKE CONCAT('%%', ?, '%%') AND o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?
select id from admin where fullname like 'a%'
SELECT count(0) as orders_count FROM t_order o WHERE o.status ~~ CONCAT('%%', ?, '%%') AND o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY i.item_id
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id ORDER BY i.item_id

SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id JOIN t_broadcast_table c ON o.status = c.status WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? AND o.status = ? ORDER BY i.item_id

SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id JOIN `select` c ON o.status = c.status WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? AND o.status = ? ORDER BY i.item_id

SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id JOIN "select" c ON o.status = c.status WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? AND c.status = ? ORDER BY i.item_id

SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id JOIN [select] c ON o.status = c.status WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? AND c.status = ? ORDER BY i.item_id
SELECT length.item_id password FROM t_order_item length where length.item_id = ?
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o FORCE INDEX(order_index) JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id=i.order_id WHERE o.order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE rule = ?::jsonb AND start_point=ST_GeographyFromText('SRID=4326;POINT('||?||' '||?||')') AND user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE rule IN (?::jsonb, ?::jsonb) AND start_point=ST_GeographyFromText('SRID=4326;POINT('||?||' '||?||')') AND user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE rule BETWEEN ?::jsonb AND ?::jsonb AND start_point=ST_GeographyFromText('SRID=4326;POINT('||?||' '||?||')') AND order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM db1.t_order
SELECT sum(if(status=0, 1, 0)) func_status FROM t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT INTERVAL(status,1,5) func_status FROM t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT CONCAT(LEFT(status, 7), 'test') FROM t_order_item WHERE user_id = 10
SELECT DATABASE()
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE MOD(order_id, 1) = 1
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE DATE_FORMAT(current_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = '2019-12-18'
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(113.358772, 23.1273723), POINT(user_id,order_id)) != 0
SELECT CURRENT_USER
SELECT * FROM t_order_item WHERE MATCH(t_order_item.description) AGAINST (? IN NATURAL LANGUAGE MODE) AND user_id = ?
select content_json->>'$.nation' as nation,content_json->>'$.title' as title from tb_content_json b where b.content_id=1
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE JSON_VALUE(items, '$.name' RETURNING VARCHAR(100)) = 'jack'
SELECT CONVERT(SUBSTRING(content, 5) , SIGNED) AS signed_content FROM t_order WHERE order_id = 1
SELECT content_json::json->'title', content_json::json->'nation' FROM tb_content_json WHERE content_id = 1
SELECT * FROM tb_content_json WHERE content_json::json->>'nation'='CHINA'
SELECT content_json::json#>'{keyword,1}' FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::json#>>'{keyword,1}' FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb@>'{&title&:&abc&}'::jsonb FROM tb_content_json
SELECT '{&title&:&abc&}'::jsonb<@content_json::jsonb FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb?'title' FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb?|array['title','nation'] FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb?&array['title','nation'] FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb||'{"price":999}'::jsonb FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb-'title' FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb#-'{title}' FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb @?'$.keyword[*]?(@=="ss")' FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb@@'$.keyword[*]=="ss"' FROM tb_content_json
SELECT @rn := 1, @now_code := '' FROM t_order
SELECT @KEY := '', @num := 123 FROM t_order
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
SELECT user_id,CAST(order_id AS SIGNED) FROM t_order
SELECT CAST(order_id AS UNSIGNED),user_id FROM t_order
SELECT user_id,CAST(order_id AS SIGNED INT) FROM t_order
SELECT CAST(order_id AS UNSIGNED INT),user_id FROM t_order
SELECT user_id,CAST(order_id AS SIGNED INTEGER) FROM t_order
SELECT CAST(order_id AS UNSIGNED INTEGER),user_id FROM t_order
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department_id = 30 ORDER BY last_name

SELECT a.department_id "Department", a.num_emp/b.total_count "%_Employees", a.sal_sum/b.total_sal "%_Salary" FROM (SELECT department_id, COUNT(*) num_emp, SUM(salary) sal_sum FROM employees GROUP BY department_id) a, (SELECT COUNT(*) total_count, SUM(salary) total_sal FROM employees) b ORDER BY a.department_id
SELECT * FROM sales PARTITION (sales_q2_2000) s WHERE s.amount_sold > 1500 ORDER BY cust_id, time_id, channel_id
SELECT last_name, job_id, departments.department_id, department_name FROM employees, departments WHERE employees.department_id = departments.department_id ORDER BY last_name, job_id
SELECT * FROM employees e, LATERAL(SELECT * FROM departments d WHERE e.department_id = d.department_id)
SELECT * FROM CONTAINERS(employees)
SELECT last_name, employee_id, manager_id FROM employees CONNECT BY employee_id = manager_id ORDER BY last_name
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE()
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE time = CURRENT_TIME
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE time = CURRENT_TIME()

SELECT country, prod, year, s FROM sales_view_ref MODEL PARTITION BY (country) DIMENSION BY (prod, year) MEASURES (sale s) IGNORE NAV UNIQUE DIMENSION RULES UPSERT SEQUENTIAL ORDER (s[prod='Mouse Pad', year=2001] = s['Mouse Pad', 1999] + s['Mouse Pad', 2000], s['Standard Mouse', 2002] = s['Standard Mouse', 2001]) ORDER BY country, prod, year

SELECT country, year, sale, csum FROM (SELECT country, year, SUM(sale) sale FROM sales_view_ref GROUP BY country, year) MODEL DIMENSION BY (country, year) MEASURES (sale, 0 csum) RULES (csum[any, any] = SUM(sale) OVER (PARTITION BY country ORDER BY year ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING)) ORDER BY country, year

SELECT SUBSTR(country,1,20) country, SUBSTR(prod,1,15) prod, year, sales FROM sales_view WHERE country='Italy' MODEL RETURN UPDATED ROWS PARTITION BY (country) DIMENSION BY (prod, year) MEASURES (sale sales) RULES (sales[FOR prod in ('Mouse Pad', 'Bounce', 'Y Box'), 2005] = 1.3 * sales[cv(prod), 2001]) ORDER BY country, prod, year

SELECT SUBSTR(country,1,20) country, year, localsales, dollarsales FROM sales_view WHERE country IN ('Canada', 'Brazil') GROUP BY country, year MODEL RETURN UPDATED ROWS REFERENCE conv_refmodel ON (SELECT country, exchange_rate AS er FROM dollar_conv) DIMENSION BY (country) MEASURES (er) IGNORE NAV MAIN main_model DIMENSION BY (country, year) MEASURES (SUM(sale) sales, 0 localsales, 0 dollarsales) IGNORE NAV RULES (localsales['Canada', 2005] = sales[cv(country), 2001] * 1.22, dollarsales['Canada', 2005] = sales[cv(country), 2001] * 1.22 * conv_refmodel.er['Canada'], localsales['Brazil', 2005] = sales[cv(country), 2001] * 1.34, dollarsales['Brazil', 2005] = sales['Brazil', 2001] * 1.34 * er['Brazil'])

SELECT year, sales FROM sales_view WHERE country='Italy' AND prod='Bounce' MODEL DIMENSION BY (year) MEASURES (sale sales) RULES SEQUENTIAL ORDER (sales[ANY] ORDER BY year DESC = sales[cv(year)-1]) ORDER BY year

SELECT country, product, year, s FROM sales_view MODEL DIMENSION BY (country, product, year) MEASURES (sales s) IGNORE NAV RULES UPSERT (s[FOR (country, product, year) IN (SELECT DISTINCT 'new_country', product, year FROM sales_view WHERE country = 'Poland')] = s['Poland',CV(),CV()]) ORDER BY country, year, product
-- begin comments SELECT * FROM # middle comments t_order; -- end comments

SELECT order_id_value,order_item_id_value FROM (select 1001 as order_id_value, 100001 as order_item_id_value from dual) MODEL RETURN UPDATED ROWS DIMENSION BY(order_item_id_value) MEASURES(order_id_value) RULES(order_id_value[1] = 10001)
SELECT order_id FROM t_order WHERE user_id = $2 AND order_id = $1 OR user_id = $2
select position(binary 'll' in 'hello'),position('a' in binary 'hello')
SELECT sharding_db.t_order.* FROM t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT sharding_db.t_order.order_id FROM t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT order_id FROM public.t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT order_id FROM sharding_db.public.t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT _code,_a FROM t_order
SELECT T.USER_NO FROM T_RATION_INFO T
SELECT _binary 'abc' as a
